# A primer on Statistics using R

## We believe in making science better. This includes teaching students, postgraduates, and researchers, whether as a refresher of their knowledge or as professional development to expand their skill set. 

<br> <br> <br>

This course will cover data manipulation, visualisation and analyses using R.

It will be tailor-made to the needs of the participant. You can learn about t-tests, linear or logistic regression or other methods relevant to your research.

What's included:

-   online workshop with multiple attendees (2 hours)

-   two one-on-one meetings with an experienced statistical consultant

Presented: Dr. Russell Thomson, with 10+ years helping HDR students.

Cost: \$500+GST.

Enquiries: please email Russell.
